articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative Sends Letter to President of UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative Sends Letter to President of UNSC
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK to the United Nations sent a letter to the president of the UN Security Council Thursday.
					 Noting that he would like to bring the attention of the president to the DPRK's already stated principled stand and countermeasures in connection with a letter addressed to the DPRK by the so-called "Sanctions Committee" of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) requesting a clarification, he continued:
					
					 The DPRK totally rejects the UNSC "Resolution 1874" which was unfairly orchestrated in June 13 in wanton violation of the DPRK's sovereignty and dignity and that the DPRK will never be bound by this resolution.
					
					 We do not feel, therefore, any need to respond to the request made by the UNSC "committee".
					
					 Had the UNSC, from the very beginning, not made an issue of the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch in the same way as it kept silent over the satellite launch conducted by south Korea on August 25, 2009, it would not have compelled the DPRK to take strong counteraction such as its 2nd nuclear test.
					
					 It is all fair and square to find that the DPRK took its steps of action to cope with the high-handed act and threat which are aimed at depriving the DPRK of its rights to peaceful economic construction.
					
					 It would be a miscalculation if the UNSC, rather than apologizing for violating the legitimate right of a member state of the UN, thought that we would recognize the "sanctions resolution" which was framed up in the same way as the thief turning on the victim with a club over the DPRK's self-defensive steps.
					
					 We have never objected to the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and of the world itself. What we objected to is the structure of the six way talks which had been used to violate outrageously the DPRK's sovereignty and its right to peaceful development.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is closely related with the U.S. nuclear policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has already made clear its countermeasures to cope with sanctions as well.
					
					 Reprocessing of spent fuel rods is at its final phase and extracted plutonium is being weaponized.
					
					 Experimental uranium enrichment has successfully been conducted to enter into completion phase.
					
					 We are prepared for both dialogue and sanctions.
					
					 If some permanent members of the UNSC wish to put sanctions first before dialogue, we would respond with bolstering our nuclear deterrence first before we meet them in a dialogue.
					
					 If the UNSC only continues this standoff without making a proper judgment of which path is more favorable for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and of the world, the DPRK will be left with no choice but to take yet stronger self-defensive countermeasures as it had already warned.

articles.title: Pak Myong Son Appointed Vice Premier of DPRK Cabinet
articles.content:
Pak Myong Son Appointed Vice Premier of DPRK Cabinet
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Myong Son was appointed as vice premier of the DPRK Cabinet according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly promulgated on Sept. 4.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Government Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Government Delegation
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met and had a talk with the Cuban government delegation led by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall. 
					The head of the delegation recalled that President Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to developing the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					The Cuban people are greatly encouraged by the achievements made by the Korean people in their drive to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of the President, he said.
					
					Expressing the conviction that the party and people of the DPRK would continue to win only victories under the wise guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he stressed that the Cuban people would always stand by the Korean people.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday by Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, minister of Foreign Affairs who is heading the Cuban government delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Cuban Government Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Cuban Government Delegation
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a conversation with the government delegation of Cuba headed by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla who paid a courtesy call on him Friday.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and Cuban Government Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and Cuban Government Delegations
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the government delegations of the DPRK and Cuba at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of its delegation led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and from the Cuban side members of its delegation led by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla and Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					Reiterating their willingness to continue to develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the future, too, both sides exchanged views on a series of the issues of mutual interest at the talks.

articles.title: Cuban Government Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Cuban Government Delegation Feted
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the government of the DPRK Thursday in honor of the visiting government delegation of Cuba.
					Present there on invitation were members of the government delegation of Cuba headed by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano and his embassy officials. 
					
					Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Ui Chun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and officials concerned were present there. 
					
					Pak Ui Chun said in his speech that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with respected Fidel Castro Ruz are now growing stronger. 
					
					The Korean people are pleased with the great successes made by the Cuban people in socialist construction despite the ceaseless blockade of the U.S., he added.  
					
					Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla said the Cuban people know well about the successes registered by the Korean people in the struggle to embody the Juche idea.
					
					He emphasized that the Cuban people are following with keen interest the Korean people foiling the moves of the U.S. imperialists for aggression, true to the Songun politics.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosted Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosted Reception
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Friday in connection with the visit of the Cuban government delegation to the DPRK.
					Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin who is chairman of the DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee, Vice Department Director of the C. C., the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Thae Jong, Vice-Minister of the People's Armed Forces Pak Jae Gyong, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and officials concerned.
					
					Present there were the Cuban government delegation led by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla and Cuban embassy officials.
					
					Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Picture Album Commemorating Diamond Jubilee of DPRK-China Diplomatic Ties Released
articles.content:
Picture Album Commemorating Diamond Jubilee of DPRK-China Diplomatic Ties Released
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of releasing Picture Album commemorating the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and China "DPRK-China Friendship Develops Generation after Generation" took place in Pyongyang on Thursday. 
					The picture album published by the Foreign Languages Publishing House deals with the historical facts that the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung, Chairman Mao Zedong and other revolutionaries of the elder generation of China has grown strong under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Hu Jintao. 
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, officials in the field of the press, the delegation of the World Affairs Press of China led by its President Gao Shumao, Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials, Chinese guests staying in the DPRK and Chinese students. 
					
					Choe Kyong Guk, director and editor-in-chief of the Foreign Languages Publishing House, in his report referred to the fact that the above-said picture album, the first of its kind in the history of the development of the relations between the two countries, was released on the occasion of the "Year of DPRK-China Friendship". He expressed belief that the picture album would contribute to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					Gao Shumao in his speech noted the history proves that the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by Chairman Mao Zedong and President Kim Il Sung remains unbreakable.
					
					Liu Xiaoming said in his speech that he would join the Korean comrades in brilliantly adorning  the "Year of Sino-DPRK Friendship" and carving out a more beautiful future of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations as desired by the leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Joint Gathering Held to Mark 10th Anniversary of Founding of IMAGC
articles.content:
Joint Gathering Held to Mark 10th Anniversary of Founding of IMAGC
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A friendly joint gathering took place at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to mark the 10th anniversary of the founding of the International Martial Art Games Committee (IMAGC).
					Present there were Chang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Art Games Committee who doubles as president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the federation and secretary general of the committee, members of the executive committee, delegates of various countries and regions, Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee who is president of the Korean Martial Art Federation, officials concerned, working people and youth and students here.
					
					Hwang Pong Yong in his speech made at the gathering said that the IMAGC has achieved many successes over the past decade, expressing the belief that the committee would grow stronger to be a more prestigious international martial art organization in the future.
					
					Norman Law, executive member of the IMAGC who is president of China Hong Kong National Martial Art Games Committee, expressed the belief that all martial art players would make positive efforts to deepen the friendship among them and develop the IMAGC.
					
					 The participants of the gathering appreciated an art performance given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. They, divided into the "Red Team" and the "Blue Team," had diverse sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Great Edifices Mushroom in DPRK
articles.content:
Great Edifices Mushroom in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Many monumental edifices to glorify the era the Workers' Party of Korea have been constructed across the country by the Korean people who create things out of nothing, turning impossibility into possibility.
					The Korean-style UHP electric arc furnace was built at the Chollima Steel Complex in a short span of time, CNC machines manufactured to put the machine-tool industry of Songun Korea on the advanced level and the Pyongyang Textile Mill, one of the nation's leading light industrial bases, completely facelifted.
					
					Juche-orientation of magnesite industry has been realized in the Komdok area and the Majon Hotel, the Kalma Theatre and others constructed in the east coastal area.
					
					Rice ears are getting ripe in thousands of hectares of paddy fields reclaimed in the Taegyedo tideland by damming the West Sea. And the Kujang Fish Farm has been reconstructed on an expansion basis to open a bright vista for increasing the production of freshwater fish.
					
					A fish farm in Sinchang succeeded in breeding sturgeon whose artificial proliferation was regarded as difficult.
					
					Latest building materials and foodstuff production bases including the Taedonggang Tile Factory and the Samilpho Special Products Factory are making their appearance in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Undan, Water Disinfectant
articles.content:
Undan, Water Disinfectant
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Undan, water disinfectant, drew the interests of visitors in the national exhibition of successes in quality control held recently in the DPRK.
					Unsu sanitized by Undan has marvelous germicidal power on pathogenic germs as natural antibiotic.
					
					One piece of undan weighing 2.5 grams sterilizes about 2,000 liters of water.
					
					Unsu is not decomposed for three months and has good taste.
					
					When one wants to use it for the treatment of diseases, one should put it into water above 70 degrees centigrade and properly cool the water before drinking.
					
					It is not affected by sediment as it always floats on the water and can be applicable to any drinking water.
					
					It is appreciated as an ideal water disinfectant.

articles.title: Independence of Nation Precisely Means Its Life and Soul
articles.content:
Independence of Nation Precisely Means Its Life and Soul
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Only when each country and nation advance toward the national independence is it possible for them to glorify the national dignity and honor and achieve their prosperity and development.  
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The principle of national independence is a key to settling the issue of nation. Each nation is directly responsible for the solution of the nation's issue and the effort of nation itself plays a decisive role in it.
					
					The nation's existence and independent development would be unthinkable without its independence.
					
					The nation's independence guarantees not only its dignity and interests but its existence and rosy future.  
					
					Holding fast to the principle of national independence provides a sure guarantee for carving out the destiny of the country and nation and victoriously advancing the human cause of independence. 
					
					The imperialists are making desperate efforts to maintain the outdated order of aggression, plunder, domination and subjugation and hold sway over the destiny of humankind.  
					
					It is necessary to firmly adhere to the principle of national independence in order to hold in check the imperialists' domination and victoriously advance the human cause of independence. 
					
					Those people who maintain the principle of national independence can triumphantly advance the revolution and construction standing firm against the moves of imperialists and dominationists. But those who give up this principle are bound to curry favor with others and pin hope on others' method of solution, consequently meeting the fate of slaves. This is clearly proven by the reality in those countries which abandoned socialism.  
					
					It is a lesson and truth of life that independence leads to existence but blindly accepting and following other's will and demand to subordination and death.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Lauded
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Lauded
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a film show were held in Brazil and a lecture in Colombia on Aug. 22 and 25 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership with his on-site guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army provided a decisive guarantee for carrying forward the history and tradition of the Songun revolutionary cause in the DPRK generation after generation.
					
					He said that Kim Jong Il formulated the principle of Songun that the army means the party, the state and the people and the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism.
					
					He reiterated the organization's positive support and encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation, while shattering the U.S. imperialists' every ceaseless provocation.
					
					Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, in the lecture gave a detailed account of the fact that Kim Jong Il has cemented the foundation of the Songun politics by firmly establishing the system of party leadership over the whole army, and put forth a programme for modeling the whole army on the Juche idea and has wisely led the struggle to implement it, developing the Korean People's Army into invincible revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film "Reply of Korea".

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Barbados
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Barbados 
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Barbados national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on August 22.
					 David Denny, chairman of the Barbados Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Committee to Remember Kim Jong Suk Formed in Switzerland
articles.content:
Committee to Remember Kim Jong Suk Formed in Switzerland
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A committee to remember anti-Japanese heroine
					 Kim Jong Suk was formed in Switzerland on August 26.
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the above-said committee.
					
					The committee decided to set the days from August 26 to September 22 as a remembrance period and widely introduce the revolutionary life and feats of Kim Jong Suk through media and hold diverse political and cultural events in this period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige empresas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige empresas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Acero de Songjin y la Empresa Pesquera Taehung de Kim Chaek.
					Llegado a la primera empresa, recorrio el museo de la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial presenciando los imborrables datos y objetos historicos alusivos a lo que hizo el Presidente Kim Il Sung para el desarrollo del Complejo. 
					
					Destaco que gracias a la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente, la empresa se ha convertido en una gran base metalurgica poderosa y autoctona.
					
					La clase obrera de Songgang (abreviatura del Complejo de Acero de Songjin) es la verdaderamente heroica que defendio en la delantera al Partido y al lider con el acero en cada periodo y cada etapa de la revolucion, subrayo y anadio que ella debe seguir defendiendo y manteniendo en el futuro tal tradicion brillante de lucha.
					
					Al recorrer por varias horas los procesos de produccion incluyendo la sala de mando general y el taller de horno giratorio, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y produccion.
					
					Subrayo que el Complejo perfecciono con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias el mas avanzado metodo de fundicion de acero a traves del hierro Juche y prosiguio que esto constituye el exito de importancia trascendental que sera registrada en letras doradas en la historia del desarrollo de la industria metalurgica.
					
					Aprecio altamente los brillantes meritos de los funcionarios, tecnicos y obreros que lograron ese exito y les expreso agradecimiento. 
					
					El Dirigente dijo que la tarea mas importante del Complejo es aplicar cabalmente en la produccion el recien perfeccionado metodo de fundicion de acero con el hierro Juche y desarrollar la industria metalurgica con recursos y tecnologias domesticos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la Empresa Pesquera Taehung de Kim Chaek. 
					
					El Dirigente recorrio varios lugares incluso el taller de elaboracion combinada enterandose en detalles de la situacion de renovacion tecnologica y de elaboracion de pescados.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los obreros de la empresa hayan terminado en un ano la modernizacion de la cadena de procesamiento y cumplido con exceso el plan de pesca, aprecio altamente los exitos alcanzados por ellos en su trabajo e indico las tareas que se presentan ante la empresa. 
					
					Al Dirigente le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Representante coreano ante la ONU envia carta al presidente del CS
articles.content:
Representante coreano ante la ONU envia carta al presidente del CS
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU envio el dia 3 una carta al presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					En relacion con que el llamado "Comite de Sanciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU pidio a la RPDC algun esclarecimiento, el remitente expreso su deseo de recordar la ya anunciada posicion de principios y las contramedidas de la RPDC.
					
					En junio ultimo, la RPDC declaro que rechaza totalmente la "resolucion No. 1874" del CS inventada injustamente violando la soberania y la dignidad de si misma y no se comprometeria a este documento, comienza la misiva y prosigue:
					
					 Por lo tanto, no tenemos ninguna necesidad de responder a la peticion de dicho comite.
					
					Si el CS de la ONU no hubiera cuestionado desde el principio nuestro lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos como se mantuvo callado ante el lanzamiento de satelite artificial ejecutado el 25 de agosto por el Sur de Corea, no se habria desatado nuestra reaccion intransigente como la segunda prueba nuclear.
					
					 Fue sumamente justa nuestra medida de accion frente al despotismo y la amenaza para arrebatarnos hasta nuestro derecho a la construccion economica pacifica.
					
					 Seria una equivocacion si el CS de la ONU hubiera pensado que la RPDC iba a reconocer esa "resolucion de sancion", que ha sido fabricada segun la logica de bandido acusando las medidas de autodefensa de ella, lejos de pedir disculpas por la violacion del derecho legitimo de un pais miembro de la ONU.
					
					 Nos opusimos a la estructura de las conversaciones a 6 bandas usadas para violar flagrantemente la soberania de la RPDC y su derecho al desarrollo pacifico, pero nunca hemos negado la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana  y el resto del mundo.
					
					 La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta relacionada estrechamente con la politica nuclear de EE.UU. sobre Corea.
					
					 Ya hemos dejado en claro las contramedidas a la sancion.
					
					Se realiza en la etapa final el reprocesamiento de las barras de combustible usadas y el plutonio extracto se va convirtiendo en el armamento.
					
					  La prueba de enriquecimiento de uranio se efectuo exitosamente y entro en la fase de conclusion.
					
					  Estamos preparados tanto para el dialogo como para la sancion.
					
					  Si algunos miembros permanentes del CS de la ONU quieren sostener el dialogo anteponiendo la sancion, accederemos a el anteponiendo el fortalecimiento de nuestro disuasivo nuclear.
					
					  Si el CS de la ONU persiste la actual situacion sin ver correctamente cual opcion sera mas favorable a la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo, nos veremos obligados a tomar otras contramedidas intransigentes para la autodefensa como ya hemos advertido.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion gubernamental de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion gubernamental de Cuba
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, converso el dia 4 con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, que le hizo una visita de cortesia, en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.  
					El jefe de la delegacion se refirio a la profunda atencion que habia prestado el Presidente           Kim Il Sung al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises.
					
					Prosiguio que el pueblo coreano libra una dinamica lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012, ano del centenario de nacimiento del Presidente.
					
					Apunto que el pueblo cubano se siente estimulado por los exitos que se logran en Corea.
					
					Tras expresar la conviccion de que el partido y el pueblo de Corea seguiran triunfando bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente, ratifico que el pueblo cubano estara siempre al lado del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion gubernamental de Cuba
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion gubernamental de Cuba
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 4 con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por el canciller, Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones gubernamentales de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones gubernamentales de Corea y Cuba
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 4 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre las delegaciones intergubernamentales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana, los miembros de la delegacion presidida por el canciller Pak Ui Chun y por la cubana, los miembros de la delegacion encabezada por el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla y el embajador cubano en la RPDC, Jose Manuel Galego Montano.
					
					Ambas partes reafirmaron la voluntad de seguir desarrollando en el futuro tambien  las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises e intercambiaron  sus opiniones sobre una serie de los problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Gobierno coreano ofrece banquete en honor de delegacion cubana
articles.content:
Gobierno coreano ofrece banquete  en honor de delegacion cubana
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 3 un banquete en honor de la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Cuba, de visita en Corea.
					A la comida fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion encabezada por el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la embajada cubana en Corea.
					
					Tambien, estuvieron presentes el canciller Pak Ui Chun, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Pak Ui Chun se refirio a que se fortalecen y se desarrollan las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el estimado companero Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					Agrego que el pueblo coreano se regocija de que aun en medio del incesante bloqueo de Estados Unidos, el pueblo cubano logra grandes exitos en la construccion socialista.
					
					Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, en su intervencion, dijo que el pueblo cubano conoce bien los exitos del pueblo coreano logrados en la lucha por materializar la idea Juche.
					
					Enfatizo que su pueblo observa con profundo interes el hecho de que en acato a la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) el pueblo coreano frustra las maniobras de agresion de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
